byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and JEFF ZELENY

abstract: Herman Cain acknowledged that he was accused of sexually harassing women while running the National Restaurant Association, but said he was innocent.
snippet: Herman Cain acknowledged that he was accused of sexually harassing women while running the National Restaurant Association, but said he was innocent.

headline.main: Cain Calls Harassment Issue a 'Witch Hunt'
